dc_title_s: An historical map & plan of the campaign in Belgium A.D. 1815 : exhibiting the cantonments, encampments, positions, bivouacs, advance, retrograde movements, retreat, flight &c. of the forces of France, England, and Prussia, with the attacks of the 15th, battles of Ligny and Quatre Bras on the 16th, and of the battle of Waterloo gained over the French by the English & Prussians on Sunday the 18th of June
dc_description_s: Relief shown by hachures. "This map is respectfully offered ... by a near observer ... of the battle of Waterloo by the allied generals ... and officially published by their several authorities." Includes text titled "Historical sketch of the hostilities in the Netherlands 1815," statistical tables, and index to points of interest.
